sourcesContent:
import { StatusBar } from 'expo-status-bar';
import React from 'react';
import { StyleSheet, Text, View, TouchableOpacity, Image, FlatList, ScrollView, Button } from 'react-native';
import { AntDesign, Ionicons, MaterialCommunityIcons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import { NavigationContainer } from '@react-navigation/native';
import { createNativeStackNavigator } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';

export default function App() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            {/* <View style={styles.header}>
                <TouchableOpacity>
                    <View style={{ marginTop: 25, }}>
                        <AntDesign name="left" size={24} color="black" />
                    </View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <View style={{ alignItems: 'center', marginTop: -18, }}>
                    <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize:15}}>GIỎ HÀNG</Text>
                </View>
            </View> */}
            <View style={{ width: 500, height: 1, marginTop: 10, backgroundColor: '#DDDDDD' }} />
            <View style={styles.main}>
                <View style={styles.product}>
                    <View style={styles.img}>
                        <Image
                            style={styles.ava}
                            source={require('../image/N1.jpg')}
                        />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.content}>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', }}>
                            <Text style={styles.shirt}>Áo nỉ nam</Text>
                            <View style={{ marginLeft: 160, }}>
                                <TouchableOpacity>
                                    <AntDesign name="delete" size={24} color="black" />
                                </TouchableOpacity>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.quantity}>
                            <View style={styles.size}>
                                <Text>Màu sắc:</Text>
                                <Image
                                    style={styles.color}
                                    source={require('../image/xanh.jpg')}
                                />
                                <Text style={{ marginLeft: 10, }}>Kích cỡ: L</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <Text style={{ color: 'red', }}>499.000 đ</Text>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginLeft: 230, marginTop: -25,}}>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="minuscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                            <Text style={{ marginLeft: 8, marginRight: 8, }}>2</Text>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="pluscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                </View>
                <View style={{ width: 300, marginLeft: 40, height: 1, marginTop: 10, backgroundColor: '#DDDDDD' }} />
                <View style={styles.product}>
                    <View style={styles.img}>
                        <Image
                            style={styles.ava}
                            source={require('../image/N2.jpg')}
                        />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.content}>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', }}>
                            <Text style={styles.shirt}>Áo nỉ hình mickey</Text>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <View style={{ marginLeft: 90, }}>
                                    <AntDesign name="delete" size={24} color="black" />
                                </View>
                            </TouchableOpacity>


                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.quantity}>
                            <View style={styles.size}>
                                <Text>Màu sắc:</Text>
                                <Image
                                    style={styles.color}
                                    source={require('../image/red.jpg')}
                                />
                                <Text style={{ marginLeft: 10, }}>Kích cỡ: M</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <Text style={{ color: 'red', }}>299.000 đ</Text>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginLeft: 230, marginTop: -25 }}>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="minuscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                            <Text style={{ marginLeft: 8, marginRight: 8, }}>2</Text>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="pluscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                </View>
                <View style={{ width: 300, marginLeft: 40, height: 1, marginTop: 10, backgroundColor: '#DDDDDD' }} />
                <View style={styles.product}>
                    <View style={styles.img}>
                        <Image
                            style={styles.ava}
                            source={require('../image/N3.jpg')}
                        />
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.content}>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', }}>
                            <Text style={styles.shirt}>Áo nỉ nam</Text>
                            <View style={{ marginLeft: 160, }}>
                                <TouchableOpacity>
                                    <AntDesign name="delete" size={24} color="black" />
                                </TouchableOpacity>
                                
                            </View>


                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.quantity}>
                            <View style={styles.size}>
                                <Text>Màu sắc:</Text>
                                <Image
                                    style={styles.color}
                                    source={require('../image/yellow.jpg')}
                                />
                                <Text style={{ marginLeft: 10, }}>Kích cỡ: XL</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <Text style={{ color: 'red', }}>500.000 đ</Text>
                        <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginLeft: 230, marginTop: -25 }}>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="minuscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                            <Text style={{ marginLeft: 8, marginRight: 8, }}>2</Text>
                            <TouchableOpacity>
                                <AntDesign name="pluscircleo" size={24} color="black" />
                            </TouchableOpacity>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                </View>
                <View style={{ width: 300, marginLeft: 40, height: 1, marginTop: 10, backgroundColor: '#DDDDDD' }} />
                <View style={styles.tongtinh}>
                    <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginBottom: 5 }}>
                        <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', }}>Số lượng: </Text>
                        <Text style={{ marginLeft: 260, color: 'red', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>3</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginBottom: 5 }}>
                        <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', }}>Tổng giá bán: </Text>
                        <Text style={{ marginLeft: 200, color: 'red', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>1.847.000đ</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', marginBottom: 5 }}>
                        <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', }}>Giảm giá: </Text>
                        <Text style={{ marginLeft: 260, color: 'red', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>0đ</Text>
                    </View>
                </View>
                <View style={{ width: 500, height: 1, marginTop: 10, backgroundColor: '#DDDDDD' }} />
                <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', }}>
                    <Text style={{ fontSize: 20, fontWeight: 'bold', marginTop: 10, }}>Tạm tính: </Text>
                    <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: 'red', marginTop: 16, marginLeft: 220 }}>1.847.00đ </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={{ marginTop: 20, }}>
                    <Button
                        title="ĐẶT HÀNG"
                        color='red'
                    // onPress={() => Alert.alert('Simple Button pressed')}
                    />
                </View>


            </View>
        </View>
    );
};

const Stack = createNativeStackNavigator();

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        margin: 5,
    },
    ava: {
        marginTop: 10,
        width: 60,
        height: 80,
    },
    product: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        marginTop: 10,
    },
    content: {
        marginTop: 15,
        marginLeft: 10,
    },
    color: {
        borderRadius: 50,
        width: 20,
        height: 20,
        marginLeft: 5,
    },
    size: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
    },
    shirt: {
        fontSize: 20,
        fontWeight: 'bold',
    },
    tongtinh: {
        marginTop: 10,
        margin: 10,
    },

});
